content.new:
In `HaptixControlPlugin::GetRobotStateFromSim()` and `HaptixControlPlugin::HaptixGetRobotInfoCallback()`,  we seem to be reporting joint data (limits, position, velocity) where motor data should go.  Shouldn't those values be different?

Before attendi
content.old: In the [robot info callback](#!/osrf/handsim/src/b641e22241cc78745b90049df3420a93d5f0aed5/src/HaptixControlPlugin.cc?at=default#cl-1104), we're filling the joint limits into the `motor_limit` field, and not filling in the `joint_limit`

title.new: Joint and motor data are jumbled

issue.title: Joint and motor data are jumbled
